subtitleNullable: Dataset of top rated movies perfect for building recommender systems
descriptionNullable:
**Context**
This data was created to build a model for recommending movies.

**Source**
The csv data was scraped from https://www.themoviedb.org/ and converted into
dataset using python libraries requests and pandas.

**Inspiration**
You can build a recommender system based on different attributes using the csv data.
